text: Atahpara sula'imana tara e kathate mrdu hasalena ebam balalena, â€˜he amara raba! Apani amake samarthya dina [1] yate ami apanara prati krtajnata prakasa karate pari, amara prati o amara pita-matara prati apani ye anugraha karechena tara jan'ya ebam yate ami emana satkaja karate pari ya apani pachanda karena [2]. Ara apanara anugrahe amake apanara satkarmaparayana bandadera samila karuna [3].â€™
